1058660420309925889.text:
Czech word maglajz (expressive term for mess, chaos) originates from Bosnian town Maglaj. Bosnia was occupied in 1878 by Austria-Hungary and the town saw heavy fighting. Soldiers then brought the word back home, where it made it's way into the language.

https://cs.wiktionary.org/wiki/maglajz
